ygData.subject: the POX URI and HTTP method
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I just want to confirm if this is accurate: 1. POX tunnels all its messages using POST i.e. no GETs 2. the URI used is the same URI for all POX services at

Hi,
    I just want to confirm if this is accurate: 
1. POX tunnels all its=
 messages using POST i.e. no GETs 
2. the URI used is the same URI for all =
POX services at that endpoint i.e. no unique URIs 
3. in these respects the=
 POX model is the same as the SOAP model...

Thanks,
Sean.
